alreadyTranslator: Estou a ver que já és um tradutor. Aqui estão algumas das coisas que podes precisar:
projectLink: Podes encontrar o link para o projeto [aqui](%%link%%).
question: Tens alguma dúvida?
askTranslators: Podes perguntar qualquer coisa sobre o projeto no %%botTranslators%%. Não te esqueças de enviar o link para a string a que te estás a referir!
checkGuide: Check out our guide with a bunch of useful Crowdin tools and tips to get started! You can find it on %%gettingStarted%%.
newTranslator: Are you looking to translate our bot to your own language?
join: We'd love to have you on the project! Here's how you can join us:
openProject: First, please open the project on Crowdin
howOpen: This can be done by accessing the link found [here](%%link%%)
clickLanguage: Now, click on the language you want to translate
requestJoin: In order to join that language, you must hit "Join" and write a simple message on why you want to join the project.
requestInfo:
When submitting your request, please make sure to include either your tag (e.g. Hypixel Translators#3348) or your ID (e.g. 620224469738323978).
**If you do not include at least one of these, you will be rejected!**
langRequest: It is possible that we don't support your language yet. If that's the case, execute `+lang add <language>`. This will send a message to the admins letting them know that you want this language to be added.
